MonsterPack

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • MonsterPack.Monster
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cyclop, GiantSpider, VampireBat

    public abstract class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Nicklas An abstract class that takes care of all general monsters methods.
